龙门接舷区，罗德岛舰船，底层射击训练室

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 这才第五组折返射击而已。
English: This is only the fifth turn shot.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 最后的目标转换速度明显慢了下来，而且也没有命中有效击杀点。
English: The final target transition slowed significantly and you still missed the effective kill point.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 如果是实战的话说不定已经反过来被敌人击中了。
English: If it was real combat, the enemy would had reacted and counter-attack you.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 怎么了，杰西卡，是不是这些训练对你来说还是太勉强了。
English: How are you, Jessica, is this training too much for you?

Name: Jessica
Latest: 哈，哈哈，呼...并，并不会！
English: Ha, ha, ha, *Breath*... No, no!

Name: Jessica
Latest: 请指导我继续练习！
English: Please instruct me to keep practicing!

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 气势还不错，不过强撑可不行。
English: Your will is not bad, but forcing yourself is not good at all.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 我们稍微休息10分钟，尽快将自己的气息调整好。
English: Let's take a 10 minute break and get your breath back as soon as possible.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 在这10分钟里，我会再跟你强调一次手持铳械的基础运用准则。
English: Within this 10 minutes break, I'm going to emphasize once again the basic principles of using a handgun.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 即使是在战场，也一刻都不能忘记这些最核心的部分！
English: Even on the battlefield, never forget these important lesson!

Name: Jessica
Latest: 是！
English: Yes!

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 首先永远保证姿态的稳定和平衡，不管在怎样的地形中移动，身体核心都不能放松！
English: First of all, always ensure the stability and balance of your posture, no matter what terrain movement there is, your body posture can not relax!

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 上身保持压低，保证重心。
English: Keep your upper body down and focus on your center of gravity.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 其次，控制铳械运作的源石技艺绝对不能有半点紊乱。
English: Secondly, there must be disclipline in your Originium arts control and handling of your handgun.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 从手臂连接到铳械内部，精确地感知弹药的推送情况，然后激活铳芯开火。

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 说起来轻松，但是需要细腻地进行源石技艺的持续触发。

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 一旦出现了技艺紊乱，就很可能造成射击失误甚至铳械的损坏。

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 最后则是对目标的瞄准射击和再次移动。
English: The last is aiming at the target and moving again.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 在黑钢的射击理论中，这些仅仅是基础中的基础，杰西卡你也应该了然于胸了。
English: In Black Steel's shooting theory, these are just the basics of the basics, as you should know by now, Jessica.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 那么，你知道你刚才的射击中最大的问题在哪里吗？
English: So, you know what was the biggest problem with your shooting?

Name: Jessica
Latest: 呃......是因为我的练习量不够，所以重心不稳转换的速度不快，然后源石技艺控制不精.....
English: Er... Because I don't have enough practice, so my center of gravity is unstable and my speed of reaction is not fast, and then my Originium arts control is not good...

Name: Jessica
Latest: 以及......开枪的时候总是要么犹豫要么松懈，总不能命中目标。
English: And... whenever I shoot, I always hesitated or relaxed my posture, causing me to never hit my intended target.

Name: Jessica
Latest: 啊啊啊，这么一想我这不是每一个部分都有很大的问题吗！
English: Ahh, so I think I have a big problem in everything!

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 你说得一半对，一半不对。
English: You are half right and half wrong.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 杰西卡你总是想要兼顾一切，既想要做到速度够快，还要命中率够高。
English: Jessica you're always trying to do everything at once, you're trying to be fast enough and you're trying to hit the target as accurately as possible.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 在不知不觉期间，你会在各个环节都畏首畏尾。
English: Before you know it, you'll hesitating on every step.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 因为你的急迫，导致你的源石技艺控制最先出现混乱。因此，当你应当开始瞄准敌人时，你却还要去进行铳械内部的控制检验。
English: Because of your urgency, your Originium arts control is the first to go haystack. Therefore, when you should be aiming at the enemy, you are instead conducting a control check inside your handgun.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 从这里开始，你的射击就会出现问题。
English: From here on, your shooting will have a problem.

Name: Jessica
Latest: 原、原来是这样的...！？

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 首先你要做的是丢掉那些你太在意的各个方面，先专注于指尖。
English: The first thing you need to do is get rid of all the aspects that you care too much about and focus on your fingertips first.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 相信你的搭档，手中的枪不会欺骗你。
English: Trust your partner and that your handgun will not deceive you.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 你如何对待它，它就会如何回应你。
English: How you treat it will respond back in kind to you.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 源石技艺输送的量和速度不是关键，谨记，精度控制和稳定性才是最重要的部分。
English: The amount and speed of Originium arts control is not the key, remember, precision control and stability is the most important part.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 来吧，继续。连续移动到三个练习台对前方多个目标进行快速射击。
English: Come on, let's continue. Practice moving to three practice tables in succession and shoot quickly at multiple targets in front of you.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 再进行五组！专注于手上的源石技艺！
English: Five more sets! Focus on the Originium arts control in hand!

Name: Jessica
Latest: 好的！
English: Good!

Name: Franka
Latest: 基本训练、基本训练、基本训练，已经是第三个小时了......
English: Basic training, basic training, and more basic training, it's been three hours...

Name: Franka
Latest: 我可以离开这个充满汗味的训练室了吗。
English: Can I leave this sweaty training room?

Name: Franka
Latest: 只是杰西卡的一个切城废墟的侦查任务而已，至于看重到连休息日都消耗进去吗。

Name: Franka
Latest: 难不成还会刚好偶遇出来闲逛的大恶人不成。

Name: Franka
Latest: 我觉得杰西卡需要训练训练自己的自信心才对。
English: I think Jessica needs to train her confidence instead.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 看看这些黑钢的资料，杰西卡的各项数据都属于中等水准。
English: Looking at the data from Black Steel, Jessica's numbers are middling.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 作为特派罗德岛的正式员工之一，杰西卡自然也有不小的压力。
English: As one of the official operators in Rhodes Island, Jessica was certainly under pressure.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 虽然是和霜叶陨星她们一起的侦察任务，做好准备总不会有坏处。
English: Although it was a reconnaissance mission with Frostleaf and the others, it never hurts to be prepared.

Name: Franka
Latest: 累垮了在战场上没力气了怎么办。

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 她担心自己成为他人的累赘，想要提高自己的作战能力，所以才来专门找了我。
English: She was afraid of being a burden to others and wanted to improve her fighting ability, so she came to me.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 龙门的清扫任务结束后，我们还得回一趟黑钢本部，没有那么多时间可以陪杰西卡做训练了。
English: After cleaning up Lungmen, we had to go back to Black Steel headquarters, so we didn't have much time to train with Jessica.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 关于手持铳械的使用，我尽量也想把我更多的经验分享给她，能多一点也好。
English: I also tried to share more of my experience with her about the use of handguns, even if a little.

Name: Franka
Latest: 为了可爱的晚辈，真不错啊。

Name: Franka
Latest: 我还以为你已经忘记了我们还得回黑钢一趟。
English: I thought you'd forgotten we had to go back to Black Steel.

Name: Franka
Latest: 这一趟回去不仅要上报龙门任务的情况，还得进行例行的检验。
English: This trip is not only to report on our Lungmen mission, but also to conduct routine inspections.

Name: Franka
Latest: 你就完全不准备一下？不怕这次的考核评价降低了？

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 我早就准备好需要上报的资料了，我又不是回到罗德岛以后只在睡觉和闲逛。

Name: Franka
Latest: 嘿~你怎么知道我回来只睡觉和闲逛了？

Name: Franka
Latest: 雷蛇前辈真是个关照同事的人啊。

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 至于考核，如果评价降了要调走的话，我是不是就不用跟你—

Name: Franka
Latest: 她们才是真正的铳械宗师吧。碰~嗙！杰西卡能从她们那里学个一招半式，怎么也比从你这里学的强多了吧。
English: They are the true masters of guns. Bang ~ bang! Jessica could learn a trick or two from them better than she could from you.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 问他们的话，无非就是【这有什么难的，就跟走路一样简单啊】 【全凭感觉不就可以做到了？】那么几句。
English: If you ask them, they just reply, ["What's so hard about this? It's as easy as walking."] or [Can't you do it just by feeling?]. Those were their replies.

Name: Liskarm

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 拉特兰的铳械使用术过于先进和复杂。从中可得不到什么参考。

Name: Franka
Latest: 嘿，那可真是让人羡慕。

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 我们要掌握在瞬息万变的场合下的精细源石技艺控制，那可不是一般量的训练就能达到的。
English: We need to master the fine Originium arts control in situations of rapid change, which no amount of ordinary training can easily be achieved.

Name: Franka
Latest: 为什么创建黑钢的老板们，非要让下面的人使用这种费力不讨好的武器。

Name: Franka
Latest: 同样是远程作战，比起手弩操作难度高不说，弹药还贵，保养还麻烦。
English: It is a long range combat weapon, which is more difficult to operate than a crossbow. Ammunition is also more expensive and difficult to maintain.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 黑钢选择手枪不是没有道理。
English: Black Steel's choice of pistol is not unreasonable.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 制式武器对公司来说降低了管理难度和人员变动的风险，筛选了庸才。
English: Standard weapons make it easier for the company to manage the risk and staff changes, and they can also screen out mediocrity.

Name: Liskarm
Latest: 在作战中不仅能保证了射速和效率，也确实比其他的远程武器易于携带和隐藏。
